item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Nearly 1% Amid Broad-Based Sector Declines; Adani Enterprises Leads Losses
item.description: Indian equity markets closed sharply lower on 26 Jan 2026, with the Sensex falling 0.94% and the Nifty 50 declining 0.95%, dragged down by broad-based selling across sectors. Large caps underperformed, while mid and small caps faced even steeper losses amid weak global cues and subdued investor sentiment ahead of key corporate earnings. Time: 7 hours ago
